job_history.work_description: Analyzed customer profiles to identify appropriate products and provide value-added approaches to client issues. Complied with regulatory requirements, including the bank Secrecy Act, Anti Money Laundering & OFAC, etc. Top 3 Loan Sales producer and Top 1 Mortgage originator in North Denver market. Analyzed financial credit and underwrote to determine loan feasibility. Developed and maintained strong relationships with local real estate agents and small business owners. Supervised Asian Banking Center and directed internal activities, including community events and newsletters.

Assessed budget plans and present costs to forecast trends and recommend changes. Executed financial due diligence tasks on daily basis to maintain optimal organization finances. Planned and designed product and pricing strategy for membership, increasing membership by 200%. Directed the Finance Committee and conducted the organization's annual budget and financial strategic plan. Formulated, prepared, and issued financial statements with 10% increased efficiency to ensure timely deliverables.

Created, improved, developed marketing strategic plans on the company's website and social media. Mentored and guided the executive team during business development decision-making to optimize profitability, marketing strategy, and communications planning. Increased credibility and client awareness by developing technical/non-technical marketing collateral and presentations, public relations campaigns, articles, and newsletters. Built 10+ strong partnerships with recruitment agencies, universities, and student associations.

Managed all aspects of store operations, including organization, maintenance, and purchasing functions. Kept orderly and accurate accounting records by monitoring sales documentation. Improved sales process and track with the implementation of a new point of sale (POS) system.

skills.name: Financial Analysis
skills.explanation: Analyzed customer profiles, financial credit, and underwrote to determine loan feasibility, indicating strong proficiency in financial analysis.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Supervised the Asian Banking Center, directed internal activities, and led the Finance Committee, showing strong leadership skills.

skills.name: Marketing Strategy
skills.explanation: Created, improved, and developed marketing strategic plans, increasing membership by 200% and building strong partnerships, indicating strong proficiency in marketing strategy.

skills.name: Budgeting
skills.explanation: Assessed budget plans, forecasted trends, and recommended changes, showing strong proficiency in budgeting.

skills.name: Financial Planning
skills.explanation: Executed financial due diligence tasks, planned and designed product and pricing strategy, and formulated financial statements, indicating strong proficiency in financial planning.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Developed and maintained strong relationships with local real estate agents and small business owners, and created marketing collateral and presentations, showing strong communication skills.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Managed all aspects of store operations, including organization, maintenance, and purchasing functions, indicating solid working proficiency in project management.

skills.name: Community Leadership
skills.explanation: Directed community events and newsletters, and showed interest in community leadership and involvement, indicating solid working proficiency in community leadership.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Improved efficiency in financial statement preparation and ensured timely deliverables, showing solid working proficiency in time management.
